plot: Cosmos 2099: Planets brings you the exciting adventures of a starship crew patrolling the far reaches of space! Done in the old 50's style of space fiction, this is the first of a two-part story arc.
title: Cosmos 2099: Planets
plot_es: Cosmos 2099: Planets brings you the exciting adventures of a starship crew patrolling the far reaches of space! Done in the old 50's style of space fiction, this is the first of a two-part story arc.
plot_en: Cosmos 2099: Planets brings you the exciting adventures of a starship crew patrolling the far reaches of space! Done in the old 50's style of space fiction, this is the first of a two-part story arc.
